daily_summary.headline: Exciting Aurora and Routine Launches Await

top_events.title: Aurora Activity Peaks
top_events.description: A G1-class geomagnetic storm offers a good viewing opportunity for auroras, especially for observers at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check skies if you're above 60째 latitude.

top_events.title: Routine Falcon 9 Launch
top_events.description: SpaceX's Falcon 9 launches another batch of Starlink satellites, continuing its mission to expand global internet coverage.
top_events.action: Watch live stream for launch details.

top_events.title: Chinese Reusable Space Vehicle Launch
top_events.description: China's Long March 2F/G rocket launches a top-secret space vehicle, marking another step in reusable space technology.

opportunities.recommendation: Good viewing opportunity for high-latitude observers. Worth checking if you're above 60째 latitude and skies are clear.
Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65째+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
